song_lyrics: Evā Shyām maḷyā Ghanshyām maḷyā... mārā 1
rākhe sahu par e sarkhī prīti;
Evā Rām maḷyā abhirām maḷyā... mārā 2
Vinā sant krupā kyāy bhakti nathī,
ne bhakti vinā kyāy mukti nathī;
Tap dhyānī maḷyā, nirmanī maḷyā... mārā 3
title: Mane sant maḷyā Bhagvant maḷyā

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-964: Shri Paramanand Bhatt

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad

Raag(s): Bhairavi
